enchantment.ars_nouveau.reactive.desc: 도구를 사용하거나 플레이어가 피해를 입을 때 새겨진 주문이 발동할 확률이 생깁니다.
ars_nouveau.page.jar_of_light: Summons a light that will follow the user as they move. Can be summoned and dismissed at any time.
ars_nouveau.page.arcane_relay: Enables the transport of 마나 between 마나 Jars and other 마나 Relays. To pull 마나 from jars, use the Dominion Wand on the jar, and then on the relay. To send between relays or from a relay to a jar, use the wand on the relay and then the target you wish to send 마나 to. Relays may only reach up to 10 blocks away. To clear connections, sneak while using the Dominion Wand on the relay.
ars_nouveau.page.arcane_relay_splitter: Operates similar to the 마나 Relay, but will support taking from and transferring to multiple jars at once. The splitter has a much larger through-put than the 마나 Relay, and will split this throughput amongst all of its jars. See the instructions on the 마나 Relay for use.
ars_nouveau.page.enchanting_apparatus1: The Enchanting Apparatus utilizes pedestals and world 마나 for crafting. To use the Enchanting Apparatus, place any number of Arcane Pedestals nearby with their items. Place your reagent item on the Enchanting Apparatus block, and interact with the block while sneaking to begin crafting. The Enchanting Apparatus requires an Arcane Core beneath it in order to work.
ars_nouveau.page.mana_bloom_crop: A magically infused flower, 마나 Blooms provide additional 마나 to nearby 마나 Condensers as they grow and provide a source of 마나 섬유.
ars_nouveau.page.belt_of_levitation: A belt that allows the user levitate a moderate distance above the ground. Useful for climbing mountains! Simply sneak in the air while falling (or jumping) to rise.
ars_nouveau.page.ring_of_lesser_discount: In addition to providing a small bonus to maximum 마나 and 마나 regen, Rings of Discount reduce the total cost to cast a spell.
ars_nouveau.page.ring_of_greater_discoun: Provides a slightly larger discount over the Lesser Ring of Discount.
ars_nouveau.page.belt_of_unstable_gifts: Occasionally grants a random positive potion effect for a short duration. These effects can vary in strength.
ars_nouveau.page.whelp_charm: Whelps are helpful creatures with the ability to cast spells using 마나 from 마나 jars. Given a spell inscribed on Spell Parchment, whelps will cast spells in the area surrounding their Summoning Crystal. To summon a whelp, use a Whelp Charm on a summoning crystal.
ars_nouveau.page2.whelp_charm: Whelps are fragile and should be defended. In the event that they die, they will drop their charm.
ars_nouveau.page3.whelp_charm: Whelps can cast spells that begin with Touch or Projectile. You may give them a spell that is written on Spell Parchment. Currently, whelps will only target blocks surrounding their crystal. Spell casting will consume 마나 from jars that are in the vicinity of the Summoning Crystal. By default, whelps will only cast a spell if EVERY spell effect will do something. Harvest will only be cast on trees or fully grown crops, or Grow on crops that are not full grown.
ars_nouveau.page4.whelp_charm: To disable this strict mode, use a Dominion Wand, however using multiple specialized whelps is recommended. While whelps cannot pickup blocks on their own, they may store items in chests that are next to the Summoning Crystal using the Item Pickup spell. Conversely, Whelps may place blocks and interact with the world using Items. You may give an item or block to the Whelp, and it will use the item directly from the chests adjacent to the Summoning Crystal. Use Dispel on a Whelp to get your charm back!
ars_nouveau.page.carbuncle_charm: Carbuncles naturally appear in 나무ed areas in search of golden nuggets. While carbuncles are normally afraid of humans, they will allow someone to approach if they are holding a gold nugget. When a carbuncle has picked up a golden nugget, it will vanish from this world and leave behind Carbuncle Shards.
ars_nouveau.page2.carbuncle_charm: While wild carbuncles cannot be tamed, their shards may be used to summon a carbuncle.
ars_nouveau.page3.carbuncle_charm: To summon a carbuncle, use a carbuncle charm on the ground. Summoned carbuncles will pickup nearby items and can move items between inventories such as chests. Carbuncles will harvest fully grown Source Berry bushes around it. A Carbuncle will drop its charm when Dispelled or when killed.
ars_nouveau.page4.carbuncle_charm: To bind a carbuncle to place items into a chest, use the dominion wand on the carbuncle and then the inventory. To take items from an inventory, use the wand on the inventory and then the Carbuncle. Carbuncles will move items between as many inventories as you desire. Looking at a Carbuncle will tell you how many chests are being taken from, and input to. Using the Dominion Wand on a Carbuncle while sneaking will reset them.
ars_nouveau.page5.carbuncle_charm: You may dictate where items go and may be picked up by using Item Scrolls or Item Frames. A Carbuncle may be given an Item Scroll: Allow or Deny, and will only pickup and move items respecting that filter. Alternatively, you may place an Item Frame on the inventory a carbuncle is interacting with. You may either place an Item Scroll or a single item directly on the frame. Carbuncles interacting with that inventory will respect item framed filters.
ars_nouveau.page.summoning_crystal: Automation in Ars Nouveau begins with the Summoning Crystal. Summoning Crystals provide mana, resources, and tasks to special magical creatures, like Whelps! Placing a chest next to a Summoning Crystal will provide a place for summoned creatures to store their items. The area of the Summoning Crystal may be changed by right clicking.
ars_nouveau.page2.summoning_crystal: Creatures like Whelps will require 마나 to interact with the world. Place a 마나 Jar within the vicinity and begin providing it with mana. To begin your first automation, see the entry on the Whelp Charm and the Scribes Table.
ars_nouveau.page.reactive: Reactive is an enchantment that can be applied to ANY item and can be applied and upgraded by the Enchanting Apparatus. Tools and armor with the Reactive enchantment have a chance to automatically cast a spell on use or when the player is hurt. The spell that the enchantment will cast is dependent on the spell inscribed in the first crafting phase, and the user must have enough 마나 to cast the spell.
ars_nouveau.page.reactive2: To enchant an item with Reactive, place any item or armor in the apparatus. The spell parchment placed on the pedestal must be inscribed with a valid spell. See the Scribes Table for additional information. Reactive Enchantment also requires jars of 마나 near the Enchanting Apparatus. The first level enchantment requires approximately one third of a jar.
ars_nouveau.page.reactive3: To upgrade the enchantment, replace the reagent with any item that has an existing Reactive enchantment. The Tier 2 reactive enchantment requires an item with Reactive I, and the Tier 3 Reactive enchantment requires an item with Reactive II. Higher levels will require a significantly higher amount of 마나 nearby.
ars_nouveau.page.reactive4: The spell that Reactive gear casts can be changed by placing an enchanted piece of gear into the apparatus with a new inscribed spell parchment.
alert.core: 이 블록 밑에 불가사의한 코어를 배치해야 합니다.
sylph.unhappy: The sylph seems very unhappy in her home. Try sprucing it up!
sylph.content: The sylph seems content, but could be better.
sylph.extremely_happy: The sylph is extremely happy! It doesn't seem like it wants anything else.
sylph.okay_diversity: There does not appear to be much diversity.
sylph.diverse_enough: There is some diversity, but could be better.
sylph.very_diverse: The sylph thinks her home is very diverse.
sylph.extremely_diverse: The home is extremely diverse, but sylphs will never turn down a new addition to their home!
sylph.notinterested: The sylph does not seem interested in this item.
sylph.excited: The sylph would be excited to have this in their home!
sylph.toomuch: The sylph likes this item, but has enough of it already.
ars_nouveau.page.sylph_charm: Sylphs are curious nature sprites that are exclusively found in forested areas. Summoned Sylphs can be given a home in the world, and will begin producing natural materials including 나무, crops, seeds, and flowers that exist around them. Wild Sylphs can be befriended and will drop Sylph Shards if a tree is grown near them.
ars_nouveau.page2.sylph_charm: Sylphs will follow animals, players, and monsters! They will also grow grass around them every once and a while.
ars_nouveau.page3.sylph_charm: To summon a Sylph, use a Sylph charm on a Summoning Crystal. Sylphs consider their home to be 10 blocks in any direction from the Summoning Crystal. Sylphs require 마나 nearby to operate, and will only generate items if there is a chest placed next to the Summoning Crystal. You can get your charm back by using Dispel on a sylph.
ars_nouveau.page4.sylph_charm: Summoned Sylphs must be happy in order to produce materials, and their mood is determined by the number and diversity of natural materials in their home. You may use blocks on the Sylph to gain additional info if a Sylph would enjoy that block in their home. Interacting with the sylph with an empty hand will give you additional info on the Sylphs happiness.
ars_nouveau.page5.sylph_charm: Note: It can take several minutes for a sylph to update its mood after placing a block. Sylphs value diversity, and too much of one block will no longer count.
ars_nouveau.page6.sylph_charm: Drop rates are determined by happiness, diversity, and the proportions of blocks in a Sylph home. For example, to generate a lot of 원목s, grow more trees. To gain more seeds and crop harvests, plant more crops. Giving a Sylph Item Scroll:Deny will cause the sylph will no longer produce that material.
tooltip.arcane_brick: This item has been deprecated. See the section on 마나 Gems and the Crystallizer. You may craft this into gems!
ars_nouveau.page.crystallizer1: The crystallizer provides a renewable source of 마나 Gems by condensing world 마나 over time. The Crystallizer can work passively at a very slow rate, or it may be given 마나 from adjacent jars and create 마나 Gems as a much faster rate. The Crystallizer may also be accessed by Hoppers and Carbuncles.
ars_nouveau.alert.turret_type: Turrets can only use Touch or Projectile.
ars_nouveau.page.spell_turret: Turrets can be used to cast spells when given a redstone signal, functioning like a dispenser. Turrets will accept spells that use Touch and Projectile. Spells may be set using an inscribed piece of Spell Parchment. In order to cast spells, turrets will draw 마나 from nearby 마나 Jars. Turrets may use Item Pickup and Place Block as long as an inventory is placed adjacent to this block.
ars_nouveau.page.spell_turret2: Turrets can provide compact and efficient automation. Examples include: configurable redstone clocks, one block tree or crop farms, rapid smelting with fortune, or mob farms with looting.
ars_nouveau.alert.duplicate_method: No duplicate cast methods are allowed.
ars_nouveau.rune.touch: Runes must have Touch as their first glyph.
ars_nouveau.rune.error: Rune threw an error. Please report this! Bye rune!
ars_nouveau.allow_set: Carbuncle will only take these items.
ars_nouveau.spell.disabled: This spell has been disabled in the config.
ars_nouveau.page.void_jar: A jar that can destroy items on pickup and grants a small amount of 마나 in return. To turn the jar on and off, use the jar while sneaking. To add or remove an item to be destroyed by the jar, use the jar with an item in the off hand, or use an item on the Scribes Table with the jar placed on it. The jar must be in your hotbar to function.
ars_nouveau.page.runic_chalk: Runic chalk can be used to place permanent Runes on the ground that will cast spells on entities that walk over them. To give a rune a spell, inscribe spell parchment using the scribes table. Once the rune has cast the spell, it will become uncharged. An uncharged rune will charge itself from nearby 마나 jars. Using Runic Chalk on a temporary rune will convert it to a permanent one.
ars_nouveau.wand.invalid: Invalid spell. Wands accept Effects and Augments only.
ars_nouveau.wixie.has_wixie: This cauldron already has a wixie.
tooltip.wixie_shard: Obtained by using Dispel on a witch while it is less than half health.
tooltip.carbuncle_shard: Obtained by giving a wild Carbuncle a Gold Nugget.
tooltip.sylph_shard: Obtained by growing a tree near a wild Sylph.
ars_nouveau.page.wixie_charm: A Wixie can automatically craft items for you at the expense of mana. To obtain a Wixie Shard, cast Dispel on a Witch while it is half health or less. Once you have obtained a Wixie Charm, use it on a Cauldron to summon your Wixie.
ars_nouveau.page2.wixie_charm: To select an item for crafting, use your item or block on the Wixie Cauldron.
ars_nouveau.page3.wixie_charm: The Wixie will automatically select the recipe for crafting based on the inventories nearby, you need not specify the exact materials for the recipe. For example, if you want to craft Sticks, the Wixie will mix and match planks from nearby chests in order to fulfill the recipe. Each craft requires a small amount of 마나 and will be automatically drained from nearby 마나 jars. A redstone signal on the cauldron will stop crafting.
ars_nouveau.page.wand: Wands accept only a single spell, and are inscribed using the Scribes Table. A Wand always starts with Projectile -> Accelerate, and MUST be inscribed with a spell that does not have another method. This allows you to cast spells beyond the 10 spell cap. If you want a wand that casts Break, inscribe the wand with JUST break, and your result will be a wand with Projectile -> Acclerate -> Break.
